Interface Play2Constants

All Superinterfaces:
PlayConstants
All Known Subinterfaces:
CheckerConstants, GoConstants, HexConstants, TabConstants
All Known Implementing Classes:
ccell, cell, CheckerCell, CheckerChip, CheckerGameViewer, CheckerMovespec, CheckerPlay, chipCell, commonPlayer, Game, GoBoard, GoCell, GoChip, GoMovespec, GoPlay, GoViewer, hexblob, hexCell, hexChip, HexGameViewer, Hexmovespec, HexPlay, SimpleGroup, stackCell, TabCell, TabGameViewer, Tabmovespec, TabPlay
public interface Play2Constants
extends PlayConstants

a collection of constants appropriate for 2 player games, but not appropriate for games with more players. Usually a 2 player game's "constants" interface will extend this class.

Author:
ddyer
